pkgmetadata.longdescription: Model-Based Tensor Clustering // Performs model-based tensor clustering methods including Tensor Gaussian Mixture Model (TGMM) and Tensor Envelope Mixture Model (TEMM) by Deng and Zhang (2021, tentatively accepted by Biometrics), Doubly- Enhanced EM (DEEM) algorithm by Mai, Zhang, Pan and Deng (2021) arXiv:2012.10032.
